Package neuralnetwork

Class NeuralNetworkBuilder

java.lang.Object
neuralnetwork.NeuralNetworkBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ToDoubleFunction<double[]>, DiffReal
public class NeuralNetworkBuilder extends Object implements DiffReal
This class optimizes a neural network for given data.

    • stochastic

      public DiffReal stochastic()
      Description copied from interface: DiffReal
      A quickly computed method, the expectation over all such methods is equal to this method. This method by default returns this method, but should be overwritten when ever stochastic variation might be desired. It's important that the stochastic method generated by this function generates its own stochastic methods with the same distribution.
      Specified by:
      stochastic in interface DiffReal
      Returns:
      A quickly computes less accurate stochastic variation of this method.
